title: Lux Portrait

replies.body:
Lux is one of my favorite champions, and I love, love, love this! :o

Do you have any plans for other portraits?!

I'm glad you like it!
I do plan on doing more portraits, they're great practice for me hehe
Stuck on deciding between Karma, O.S. Teemo, and Sona for who to draw next though

I do apologize, but this is the first thing I see when looking at Lux's face in your portrait:
http://www.supermansupersite.com/toyman2.jpg
